entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
